nodes.text: "The Battle Continues" is a short story written by Calliope Glass with illustrations by Katie Cook that was published in the young readers book Star Wars Galactic Storybook released January 6, 2021. It adapts Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.

Darth Vader and the Galactic Empire are continuing their fight to destroy the Rebel Alliance. The Imperial forces chase the Rebels from Hoth, and Luke Skywalker goes to Dagobah for training while Han Solo and Leia Organa escape to Cloud City. Skywalker arrives after and duels Vader.
